channel.title: GSC is back with their new game entitled...
channel.description:
Cossacks 3!
Never expected this to happen but that's pretty cool. It says it should be out by the end of the year.
[url]https://www.polygon.com/features/2015/5/18/8615339/cossacks-3-announcement-release-date-gsc-stalker[/url]
They're essentially keeping the gameplay the same as the original but in 3D and with new campaigns. Also day one mod tools. This actually makes me hopeful for a new Stalker game since doing this shows that they haven't abandoned their PC audience like so many other devs.
Edit: They just put up a site for the game today I think. And with more info and bullet points.
[url]https://www.cossacks3.com/[/url] [quote] * Breathtaking historical real-time strategy. * Actions unfold in Europe in the XVII–XVIII centuries. * Five singleplayer historical campaigns. * 12 playable nations. * Grandiose battles of up to 10,000 units on the map. * Realistic physics of bullets and cannonballs. * Considerable influence of the landscape on battle tactics. * Infinite variations of battles with computer enemies on random maps. * Flexible generator of random maps with selection of a preferable landscape. * Windows, Mac OS and Linux support. [/quote]
